Package com.jjackb14.blissapbot.playerlist

Class PlayerList

java.lang.Object
com.jjackb14.blissapbot.playerlist.PlayerList
public class PlayerList extends Object
Manages the List of Players for the BlissAPBot.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerList

      public PlayerList()
      Constructs a new PlayerList. Every time a new PlayerList is made it will be an empty TreeSet.

  • Method Details

    • newPlayerList

      public void newPlayerList()
      Creates a new and empty TreeSet that is set to the field playerList.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player) throws ExistingPlayerException
      Adds a player to the PlayerList.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to add to the PlayerList.
      Throws:
      ExistingPlayerException - if the player is already registered.

    • getPlayerList

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayerList()
      Gets the ArrayList field of playerList.
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of playerList.

    • getPlayerByIGN

      public Player getPlayerByIGN(String ign)
      Gets a Player from the PlayerList based on the given IGN.
      Parameters:
      ign - The player's in-game name.
      Returns:
      The player with the matching IGN.

    • getPlayerByGamtertag

      public Player getPlayerByGamtertag(String tag)
      Gets a Player from the PlayerList based on the given Gamtertag.
      Parameters:
      tag - The player's gamertag.
      Returns:
      The player with the matching gamertag.

    • getPlayersByMap

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayersByMap(String map)
      Gets a list of Players from the PlayerList based on the map they play on.
      Parameters:
      map - The given map.
      Returns:
      All the players registered to that map.

    • getPlayersByTribe

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayersByTribe(String tribe)
      Gets a list of Players from the PlayerList based on the tribe they are in.
      Parameters:
      tribe - The given tribe name.
      Returns:
      All the players registered to that tribe.

    • getPlayerListAsArray

      public Object[][] getPlayerListAsArray()
      Gets an Array of the PlayerList for usage in summing AP.
      Returns:
      An Array of the PlayerList.
